import React from 'react' import { useQuery } from '@apollo/client'; import { ALL_AUTHORS } from "../queries" const Authors = (props) => { const result = useQuery(ALL_AUTHORS) if (!props.show) { return null } const authors = [] return (

authors

{authors.map(a => )}
born books
{a.name} {a.born} {a.bookCount}
) } export default Authors
